Elastic Net using General Coordinate Descent

Source: R/coordinate-descent-elasticnet.R
coordinate_descent_elasticnet.Rd

Solves: min_beta 0.5/n * ||y - X*beta||^2 + lambda * (alpha * ||beta||_1 + 0.5 * (1-alpha) * ||beta||^2)

Usage

coordinate_descent_elasticnet(
  X,
  y,
  lambda,
  alpha,
  beta_init,
  batch_size = NULL,
  compile = FALSE,
  max_iter = 1000,
  tol = 1e-06
)

Arguments

X

Design matrix (n x p MLX tensor)

y

Response (n x 1 MLX tensor)

lambda

Penalty parameter

alpha

Elastic net mixing (1 = lasso, 0 = ridge)

beta_init

Initial beta

batch_size

Coordinates per batch

compile

Whether to compile

max_iter

Maximum iterations

tol

Convergence tolerance

Value

List with beta, n_iter, converged

On this page
